name: Michael Scott
notes: Declared bankruptcy by yelling it. That's not how it works, but A+ for confidence

name: Jim Halpert
notes: Spent 50% of work hours pranking Dwight, 40% looking at camera, 10% actually working

name: Dwight Schrute
desiredPresent: Assistant Regional Manager nameplate (not Assistant TO the...)
notes: Installed monitoring devices in break room. Beets. Bears. Battlestar Galactica.

name: Pam Beesly
desiredPresent: Fancy new pens for her doodles
notes: Finally left reception after many years. We're all very proud and emotional about it

name: Ryan Howard
desiredPresent: Hair gel and skinny ties in bulk
notes: Made some questionable business decisions, came back as temp. Career trajectory: 📈📉📉📉

name: Andy Bernard
notes: Punched a hole in the wall. Still calls himself 'The Nard Dog' unironically

name: Angela Martin
notes: Judges everyone. Loves her cats more than people. Can't really blame her.

name: Kevin Malone
notes: Uses 'Why waste time say lot word when few word do trick?' as communication strategy

name: Stanley Hudson
desiredPresent: Pretzel Day every day for a year
notes: Did a crossword puzzle instead of working. Every. Single. Day. Living the dream.

name: Oscar Martinez
notes: Office know-it-all, but in a helpful way. Always has the facts ready.

name: Phyllis Vance
desiredPresent: Microwave popcorn with Bob Vance nameplate
notes: Married to Bob Vance, Vance Refrigeration. Did we mention Bob Vance, Vance Refrigeration?

name: Toby Flenderson
notes: Works in HR which means he's not part of the family. Nobody appreciates HR.

name: Kelly Kapoor
notes: Talks non-stop about celebrities, shopping, and Ryan. Mostly Ryan. OK, only Ryan.

name: Creed Bratton
notes: Does quality assurance but no one knows what that means. Very mysterious past. Definitely quirky.

name: Meredith Palmer
notes: Got hit by Michael's car. Supplier relations expert. Makes bold life choices.

name: Darryl Philbin
notes: Warehouse manager who's actually competent. Taught Michael about fleece-it-out. Dinkin' flicka.

name: Erin Hannon
notes: Thinks disposable cameras are single-use. Sweet and enthusiastic. We love her positivity.

name: Gabe Lewis
notes: Corporate liaison who's a bit awkward. Manages to make everything uncomfortable somehow.

name: Jan Levinson
notes: Ex-boss of Michael. Started a candle business. Living her best entrepreneurial life.

name: Holly Flax
desiredPresent: Matching Woody & Buzz Lightyear dolls for puppet shows
notes: Plays Yoda to Michael's Luke. Only HR person Michael loves. They're soulmates. We ship it.

name: Todd Packer
notes: Inappropriate jokes are his specialty. Eventually got let go. Everyone was relieved.

name: Roy Anderson
notes: Ex-fiancé of Pam. Had some conflicts with Jim. Now has gravel business. Character development: 10/10

name: Karen Filippelli
notes: Dated Jim during his Stamford phase. Caught up in the Jim-Pam situation. Deserved better.

name: Robert California
notes: Talked his way into CEO position in one interview. Everything he says sounds profound and mysterious.

name: Nellie Bertram
notes: Took Andy's job by literally sitting in his chair. Bold strategy. Somehow it worked.

name: David Wallace
notes: CFO who keeps Scranton branch alive despite chaos. Invented 'Suck It!' vacuum for kids. Yes, really.

name: Charles Miner
notes: Made Jim run a 5K during work. Very serious about business. Soccer ball incident was unfortunate.
